Project Description
===================

Orange County Lettings is a start-up in the real estate rental industry. The start-up, in the midst of an expansion phase in the United States, hired developers to improve their website (the actual Django app in that project).

Among the improvements to work on: |br|
- the structure that must be changed from monolithic into modular |br|
- optimization of the code |br|
- set up of a CI/CD pipeline (Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery) |br|
- errors report via Sentry |br|
- creation of the documentation (the one you are reading, yes)

.. |br| raw:: html
    
        <br>
